scripts.dev: node ./scripts/print-dev-urls.js && node ./node_modules/concurrently/dist/bin/concurrently.js -k -n server,client -c blue,green "npm --prefix server run dev" "npm --prefix client run dev"
scripts.test: npm --prefix server run test && npm --prefix client run test
scripts.verify: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.install:all: npm ci --prefix server && npm ci --prefix client
